name: Smoltz Light (Bottle)
description:
HEI: 18
Effects: Cognitive Impairment, Dehydrating
Crafted from select rice and barley for a traditional flavor passed down by generations of brewmasters. That’s the taste of Smoltz Light.
description_cn:
HEI：18
效果：认知障碍，口渴
以精选的大米及大麦作为原料，由传统酿造师世代相传的纯正工艺造就的纯正口感。这就是斯莫尔茨淡爽的独特风味。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-RaceBar_GrimHEX
